column4: I need some help on getting my 56k modem to work and I am using ubuntu 9.04 server with HSFi CX11252-11
it seems the modem is not getting detected
yes but is only up to 8.10 but im using 9.04
im guessing you're talking about the dell drivers?
this is a Conexant modem, right?
run uname -r in the terminal for me
I got the newest driver installed but i got error message
dpkg: dependency problems prevent configuration of hsfmodem:
well you can purchase their $20 package, which you would need anyway to get the full speed and they will help you through the installation
